markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Unfetter Eidolon](/Spells.aspx?ID=1051)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 145 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 100 feet

**Target** your [eidolon](/classes/summoner/eidolons)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You loosen the link between yourself and your eidolon, allowing it to travel farther from you for a short period of time. While the spell is active, your eidolon can travel an unlimited distance away from you. When the spell ends, if your eidolon is more than 100 feet away from you, it unmanifests.
name: Unfetter Eidolon

summary: You loosen the link between yourself and your eidolon, allowing it to travel farther from you for a short period of time.
summary_markdown: You loosen the link between yourself and your eidolon, allowing it to travel farther from you for a short period of time.
text: Unfetter Eidolon Source Secrets of Magic pg. 145 1.1 Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 100 feet Target your eidolon Duration 1 minute --- You loosen the link between yourself and your eidolon, allowing it to travel farther from you for a short period of time. While the spell is active, your eidolon can travel an unlimited distance away from you. When the spell ends, if your eidolon is more than 100 feet away from you, it unmanifests.
